hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/bash -xe # Replace content in Dockerfile sed -i "s|ENV NATS_SERVER=localhost:4222|ENV NATS_SERVER=${NATS_SERVER_URL}|g" Dockerfile sed -i "s|ENV ELASTIC_SEARCH_VERSION=|ENV ELASTIC_SEARCH_VERSION=${ELASTIC_SEARCH_VERSION}|g" Dockerfile sed -i "s|ENV ELASTIC_USERNAME=|ENV ELASTIC_USERNAME=${ELASTIC_USERNAME}|g" Dockerfile sed -i "s|ENV ELASTIC_PASSWORD=|ENV ELASTIC_PASSWORD=${ELASTIC_PASSWORD}|g" Dockerfile sed -i "s|ENV ELASTIC_INDEX=|ENV ELASTIC_INDEX=${ELASTIC_INDEX}|g" Dockerfile sed -i "s|ENV ELASTIC_HOST=|ENV ELASTIC_HOST=${ELASTIC_HOST}|g" Dockerfile sed -i "s|ENV FLUSHBYTES=1000|ENV FLUSHBYTES=${FLUSHBYTES}|g" Dockerfile sed -i "s|example.io|${ImageRepository}|g" deployment.yaml sed -i "s|${ImageRepository}/lumberjack|actio.azurecr.io/lumberjack-${envName}|g" deployment.yaml sed -i "s/\${GH_TOKEN}/${READ_GH_TOKEN}/g" .npmrc # Login to container registry echo $REG_PASS | buildah login --username $REG_USER --password-stdin ${ImageRepository} # Build Docker Image buildah bud --format docker --ulimit nofile=4096:4096 -t ${ImageRepository}/lumberjack-${envName}:1.0.0 . # Push Docker Image to Container Registry buildah push ${ImageRepository}/lumberjack-${envName}:1.0.0 # Apply newly built image to a kubernetes pod kubectl apply -f deployment.yaml # Rollout restart the deployment to take effect kubectl rollout restart deployment lumberjack-rel-1-0-0 -n processor # Apply the service configuration kubectl apply -f service.yaml
